summary: I took the Executioner Hood from the Dark Brotherhood quest and added a Heavy/Light version...
descriptionHtml:
I took the Executioner Hood from the Dark Brotherhood quest and added a Heavy/Light version... I did not add them to any vendors or other locations. I only did it for my own character but its so totally cool I just could not resist sharing.

EXECUTIONER MASK HEAVY // EXECUTIONER MASK

Drop the console and type : player.additem 000d63 For the Heavy version
player.additem 000d62 For the Light Version

I gave the light studded helmet stats and the heavy steel helmet stats.

Also in this save file there is a duplication I made for the Knights of the Nine Battlemage by Maty743 and SolarT .. What I did was add duplicates of his armor in the construction kit without the enchantments and with Light and Heavy versions... They are not in any vendors or locations


KNIGHTS OF THE NINE UNENCHANTED BATTLEMAGE ARMOR HEAVY/LIGHT

type : HELP "KOTN" in the console : it will show you LightBattlemage<piece> HeavyBattlemage<piece>

select which one you want, I only did it so I could customize my own character.


I am not privy to modding exactly I wouldn't say you needed the Knights of the Nine mod for this to work? I think it is just an off chute item? I did have Knights of the Nine active in editing... but since its console add only, I am sure it would not be an issue for anyone to have the files available, without the core file.

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28494/? - KOTN mage armor
author: Patrick

files.name: Heavy-Light Executioner Hood Heavy-Light KOTN Battlemage Armor
